name: Shaun's TD Game #0.0.1
description:
The aim of the game is to earn money from defeating different enemies and use that to purchase new and better turrets. You must stop the endless barrage of enemies from reaching your base (the pink square). So far there are three turret variations: T1, T2 and Rocket. Each has its own advantages and disadvantages.

The enemies follow a predefined route, using waypoints. At the moment you are given $10,000 at the start of the game, although this won't be a recurring feature :(.
